creator: jerrymonkey123
title: How Can You Do to Fix ALLSTEPS Problem?
description: This project provides a solution for when the 'View All Steps' button on Instructables doesn't work, preventing users from seeing all steps of a project on a single page.
steps: Make sure to look at the URL after clicking the 'View All Steps' button. For example, if the original URL is 'www.instrucables.com/id/An-instrucable's-name/', after clicking the button, it should change to 'www.instrucables.com/id/An-instrucable's-name/?ALLSTEPS'.

If the URL does not change to include '?ALLSTEPS', manually add '?ALLSTEPS' to the end of the URL's last forward slash. For example, change 'https://www.instructables.com/id/Make-cookies/' to 'https://www.instructables.com/id/Make-cookies/?ALLSTEPS'.
